nodes.text: Aurra Sing's blockade runner was a small capital ship that had once belonged to the Senex pirates who kidnapped Sing as a young girl. It was comparable in size to a Consular-class space cruiser and had a Corellian Engineering Corporation design aesthetic. After finishing her Anzati training, Aurra Sing took revenge on her kidnappers and stole their blockade runner. Sing would leave the ship adrift as a decoy for pursuers while ambushing them from her starfighter.
